chapter.title: Portal Administration
chapter.para: The &PRODUCTABBR; Portal is the web interface you initially sign in to when accessing other &PRODUCTABBR; applications and features.
Review the Welcome information for vital information to ensure you protect private data.

Any applications that you have access to are listed under My Applications on the right of the Portal. This includes the &COMPANYABBR; Dashboards application and any environment specific applications to which your administrator has given you access.

Clicking on your name displays a menu. To log out of the &PRODUCTABBR; Portal, select the Logout link to end your session. If you experience a problem report the problem to your administrator by clicking on the Report a problem link.

These instructions describe the default &PRODUCTABBR; Portal. It is possible that the Portal for your organization has been customized and differs from what has been displayed and described here. If your Portal has been customized and you have questions relating to using your Portal, your administrator is likely the best source of information.
